**Token Address**
e.g: https://vicscan.xyz/address/0x

**Token Symbol**
e.g: VIC, C98

**Token Name**
e.g: Viction, Coin98

**Token Logo**
PNG 256px by 256px

**Token Description**
A clear and concise description of the token.

**Website**
Link to the website that will use the token.

**Social links**
e.g Github, telegram, twitter
